attributes.action: Remove Lord Tony Hall from the BBC.
attributes.additional_details: Besides total incompetent, the BBC director general show full well now what his happening, the buck stops with him, he is well out of his depth and should resign, the BBC is not fit for purpose anymore.
attributes.background: Tony Hall is not fit to be director general, the BBC has lost all credibility, with Tony Blackburn, being made a scapegoat, to cover up was a pathetic report in to the abuse that cost the tax-payer £6.5m.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for appointing the Director General.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_u
